items.title: Russia trying to stop meeting on peace and prolong war, says Zelensky
items.description: Volodymyr Zelensky urges Western allies to impose fresh sanctions on Moscow if it shows no interest in peace.

items.title: Sri Lanka's former president Ranil Wickremesinghe arrested
items.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe has been arrested in connection with the alleged misuse of funds, officials said.

items.title: Canada to drop many of its retaliatory tariffs on the US
items.description: The move comes after the two countries blew past a self-imposed deadline to reach a trade agreement.

items.title: UK agrees to pay Kenyans affected by military fire
items.description: Thousands says they have suffered health problems or lost property after fire caused by British military.

items.title: Famine confirmed in Gaza City is 'failure of humanity', UN chief says
items.description: A UN-backed body confirms famine in Gaza Strip and surrounding areas, and says half a million are facing "catastrophic" conditions.
